pr_title: Fix NPE in PlatformResolver filterPlatform() when selector is null

timeline.bodyText:
I'm concerned by the description of this, maybe
GIVEN_recipe_catch_all_manifest_and_no_selectors_WHEN_random_platform_THEN_use_all_selector()
Or something like that?
timeline.author: JamieHunter
